content: Your writing in this application is structured and focused, with a clear narrative that presents your academic and personal growth while attending Worcester Polytechnic Institute. You use specific examples to illustrate your skills and experiences, and demonstrate a clear understanding of the goals you wish to achieve in pursuing neural interfaces. You also show an ability to adapt to new research environments, as evidenced by your success in the summer undergraduate research program in Computational Neuroscience despite the challenges presented by the pandemic. Overall, your writing is well-organized, concise, and demonstrates a strong command of technical language in the field of biomedical engineering and neuroscience.
